actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide a penalty for the robbery of a controlled substance from a pharmacy.

summary.text: Provides criminal penalties for the robbery of a controlled substance from a pharmacy, and for any assault or killing taking place during such robbery or attempted robbery.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide a penalty for the robbery of a controlled substance from a pharmacy.
